required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 04, 2014
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.official_title: International Post-Marketing Surveillance of Willfact-Wilfactin in Patients With Inherited Von Willebrand Disease.

lead_sponsor.agency: Laboratoire français de Fractionnement et de Biotechnologies

clinical_study.source: Laboratoire français de Fractionnement et de Biotechnologies

brief_summary.textblock: Collect information about WILLFACT or WILFACTIN in their real life clinical use and identify the therapeutic practices in an international environment.

detailed_description.textblock: Non-interventional, prospective, non comparative, international, multicentre study.

clinical_study.study_design: Observational Model: Cohort, Time Perspective: Prospective

primary_outcome.time_frame: at each follow-up visit, up to 24 months
primary_outcome.description: Product consumption (VWF International Units) by analysis of posology, frequency in relation to the severity of bleeding, type of surgery and other clinical situations.

secondary_outcome.measure: Collection and analysis of adverse events and VWF immunological safety
secondary_outcome.time_frame: at each follow-up visit, up to 24 months
secondary_outcome.description: Adverse event (type, seriousness, severity, frequency, outcome), anti VWF-antibody and anti FVIII-antibody.

study_pop.textblock: Any patient, whatever their age, with inherited von Willebrand disease

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Patients with inherited von Willebrand disease
- Patients treated with WILLFACT or WILFACTIN
- Patient or parent/legal representative who has provided written signed and dated informed consent before any data collection.
Exclusion Criteria:
- Patients who usually do not keep injection log up to date, when treated.

overall_official.affiliation: Medizinische Klinik III, Goethe Universitat, D-60590 Frankfurt/Main (Germany)
Faculty of Medicine, University of Milan, 20122 Milan (Italy)
